issue.title: Failure to copy config.yaml on pipelines (docker)

content.raw:
I can reproduce this locally after deleting `~/.ignition/fuel/config.yaml`. It looks like `config.yaml` is not being installed:

~~~
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/pkgconfig/ignition-fuel_tools1.pc
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-fuel_tools1/ignition-fuel_tools1-config.cmake
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-fuel_tools1/ignition-fuel_tools1-config-version.cmake
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-fuel_tools1/ignition-fuel_tools1-targets.cmake
-- Installing: /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-fuel_tools1/ignition-fuel_tools1-targets-coverage.cmake
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/detail/Export.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/Export.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/libignition-fuel_tools1.so.1.0.0
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/libignition-fuel_tools1.so.1
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/libignition-fuel_tools1.so
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/ruby/ignition/cmdfuel1.rb
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/ClientConfig.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/FuelClient.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/Helpers.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/JSONParser.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/LocalCache.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/Model.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/ModelIdentifier.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/ModelIter.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/ModelIterPrivate.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/ModelPrivate.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/REST.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/Result.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/Zip.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/ign.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/../fuel_tools.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/include/ignition/fuel_tools1/ignition/fuel_tools/config.hh
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/share/ignition/fuel1.yaml
-- Installing: /usr/local/share/ignition/ignition-fuel_tools1_0/ignition-fuel_tools1.tag.xml
~~~
content.html:
I can reproduce this locally after deleting ~/.ignition/fuel/config.yaml. It looks like config.yaml is not being installed:

-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/pkgconfig/ignition-fuel_tools1.pc
-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/cmake/ignition-fuel_tools1/ignition-fuel_tools1-config.cmake

-- Up-to-date: /usr/local/lib/libignition-fuel_tools1.so.1
